author: Reuters Editorial
title: inTest Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.04
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - inTest Corp:
* INTEST REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS * SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 TO $0.26
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $19 MILLION TO $20 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $18.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $17.8 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ON A NON-GAAP BASIS, ADJUSTED NET EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.22 TO $0.26 FOR Q2 Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
